top_comments.comment: I actually really like the idea of the Octagon being placed on a frozen tundra, I'd love it if you leaned into the whole snow thing

As requested:
Step 1: Switch the Refill off
Step 2: go into hopper and check if first inventory slot is empty
Step 3: Break redstone comparator  out of item frame
Step 4: Place the comparator on the irorn trapdoor facing you
Step 5: Flick the lever on the edge of the railroad system once
Step 6: put the item somewhere in your hotbar
Step 7: open the hopper and use numberkeys to put the item into the first inventory slot
Step 8: go back to the lever seen in step 5 and click it again
Step 9:  go look into the hopper again 
Then your done!
Creative is what i thought lol

Octagon needs a commercial showing "Just How Easy It Is!" to pay in the barrel.

Bonus points for a live action commercial.
Hi Ren Happy Halloween 🎃 and i Love you and your vid’s and thank you for being yourself and doing YouTube❤️

As requested:
Step 1: Switch the Refill off
Step 2: go into hopper and check if first inventory slot is empty
Step 3: Break redstone comparator  out of item frame
Step 4: Place the comparator on the irorn trapdoor facing you
Step 5: Flick the lever on the edge of the railroad system once
Step 6: put the item somewhere in your hotbar
Step 7: open the hopper and use numberkeys to put the item into the first inventory slot
Step 8: go back to the lever seen in step 5 and click it again
Step 9:  go look into the hopper again 
Then your done!

Your pay in the barrel sign might be a little small, Ren. Hermits may not be able to see five block high letters. Some of them are freaking blind.
Shulker sales tanking is no surprise given the glut of shells on the server. In a world full of pigs, the only way to sell bacon is to lower the price. Simple supply and demand 👍😝
I think adding more grey and details will help it a lot! Even some white wool will help break it up but even just the white concrete powder it looks like a very dead and sandy location c:
